full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 102 of 228 LC2Qmax3 Alessi - Direct start working for Mr. Epstein? A. I start working for him around 1990. Q. And about when did you stop working for him? A. I start -- I stop working for Mr. Epstein December -- at the end of December 2002. Q. At first, during the first couple years you worked for Mr. Epstein, what were your job responsibilities? A. When I start working for him, my responsibility was doing repairs in the house, the dismantling of many rooms in the house. That's it. Q. About how long did those renovations on the house take? A. It took it about a year. Q. And during that time, was Mr. Epstein able to stay in the house? A. Yes. Q. About when were the renovations completed? A. I would think, I will say it's 1991. Q. After that, were there any other renovations on Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach house? A. Yes, it was done by a big company. They did huge extension -- extensive -- expensive and extensive renovation. Q. About when were those renovations completed? A. They were completed around 1994. Q. Over the time that you worked for Mr. Epstein how, if at all, did your job responsibilities change? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017975
